about.title: Launch password protected mini-stores in a few clicks
about.body:
Select any items or collections from your store (even draft products) and showcase them in an exclusive, password protected shopping experience separate from your main site.

Retain full control over access, pricing, and promotions, and run as many sales simultaneously as you like.

valueProps.title: INSTANTLY EXCLUSIVE
valueProps.subtitle: Atelier empowers you to create private, invite-only shopping experiences. Control access and turn every visit into a VIP affair.

valueProps.title: EFFORTLESS SETUP
valueProps.subtitle: No coding, no headaches. Craft your mini store with a few clicks, choosing from stunning templates that reflect your brand's essence.

valueProps.title: BOOST SALES AND LOYALTY
valueProps.subtitle: Drive demand by offering exclusive deals to selected customers. Foster a sense of exclusivity that keeps them coming back for more.

valueProps.title: SEAMLESS INTEGRATION
valueProps.subtitle: Atelier seamlessly integrates with your Shopify store, preserving your existing setup while adding a touch of exclusivity.
